name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is a very large update that I think everyone will enjoy. Over 90 new unique and set items were added, new runes and runewords, collectible rewards, dozens of skill changes, Soul Summon improvements and much much more. Please check our Discord for the full details. I appreciate everyone's patience as I slowly build this mod into something unique, now have some fun!

I'd like to personally thank all the recent support from the Patreon subscribers and let you know it's truly appreciated. You guys have shown me how many people really want this project to succeed, and give me motivation to work that much harder and longer. You guys really are rockstars, and I can only hope some of my recent additions help showcase my gratitude.
